q: structure While Eric Schmidt will step down as CEO he will assume the role of executive chairman, focusing on deals, partnerships and broader business relationships, as well as advising Page and co-founder Sergey Brin . We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said. War costs lives Donald Rumsfeld , who served as Bush's defence chief for six years after holding the the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that in a war, many things cost lives.
